Meet PE Expectations. Exceed Market Standards.

Your PE sponsors didn't invest for incremental improvement. They expect transformation.

You're under pressure to deliver rapid growth, operational excellence, and a compelling exit story. AI isn't just an opportunity - it's essential for hitting your targets and justifying valuations.

But most AI initiatives fail. They take too long, cost too much, and deliver too little. POCs that never reach production. Consultants who don't understand PE timelines. Technology that doesn't scale.

We're different. We've transformed 50+ PE-backed companies. We understand your board's expectations, your timeline pressures, and your resource constraints. We don't build POCs - we build production systems that deliver measurable ROI within quarters, not years.

Common Questions

Q: How do you differ from other AI consultancies?

A: We build production systems in 100 days, not POCs in 12 months. We're former operators who understand PE pressures. We transfer knowledge, not create dependency.

Q: What if we don't have clean data?

A: Perfect data is a myth. We work with what you have, improve it iteratively, and deliver value from day one. Our knowledge engineering approach handles messy, real-world data.

Q: How do we justify the investment to our board?

A: We provide board-ready business cases with clear ROI projections. Most clients achieve payback within 6 months. Quick wins fund the broader transformation.
